name: Darkness Becomes You
description:
My first Jam project! I designed the game, created art assets for it, designed the beat clicking rhythm- everything but the programming was done by me. I got help and some guidance from my project partner who also programmed the game- Arooj Basit: https://aroojbasit.itch.io/

I plan on completing my vision for the game after this initial release for the game jam, I just wanted to make it in time for now. If anyone is looking to collaborate on any projects, please feel free to contact me!

This game is completely made from scratch in 2 days! Saturday and Sunday!

I hope you all enjoy this initial release!

Audio Used: https://www.storyblocks.com/audio/stock/race-against-the-clock-346797559.html
